solve.description: Configuration settings for the issue solving functionality.

llm_config.description: Configuration for the language model feature.

model_config_name.description: The identifier for the large language model to be used.

temperature.description: Controls the randomness of the model's output. Higher values mean more randomness.

enabled.description: Whether to enable verbal algorithm explanations.

languages.description: List of languages for verbal explanations.

include_pseudocode.description: Whether to include pseudocode in the output.

include_mermaid_diagram.description: Whether to include a Mermaid diagram in the output.

enabled.description: Whether to enable code implementation generation.

implementation_languages.description: List of programming languages for code implementations.

output_directory.description: Directory where solution files will be saved.
